name: A Symmetry
description:
An entry into the Brackeys 2021.1 Jam, on the theme of Stronger Together. 

Everything is (should be) explained in-game, hopefully. If you experience any lag with the web version, I've provided downloadable exports from Construct 3 for all major operating systems below. 

PLEASE NOTE: Of the downloadable desktop versions, only the Win64 version has been tested. The others are provided without documentation, testing or any statement of reliability, as options for those who cannot play reliably on web or Windows desktop.

Music from Airyluvs
